alert.note: Alert for Death Valley National Park; Western Mojave Desert (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 29 at 1:02PM PDT until May 01 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM SUNDAY TO 11 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Death Valley National Park and Western Mojave Desert. * WHEN...From 4 PM Sunday to 11 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects and reduce visibility due to blowing dust. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Hazardous crosswinds and reduced visibility due to blowing dust possible along Interstate 15 north of Barstow and Highway 190 through Death Valley National Park.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Death Valley National Park; Western Mojave Desert
